cause.description:
the problem with the situation with drugs is its very hard to stop doing drugs when you are already addicted..it is also hard to try and get help and not have a location to go...so my plan is to build or help rehabilitaion centres...please join or donate to this cause!
1. because people like my cousin need help before its too late
cause.mission: help the people who are addicted
cause.name: AAAA Rehabilitaion centre
